                <tr class="">
                    <td class="clf c"><span class="yy1">20</span><span class="yy2">24</span>/11/01</td>
                    <td class="l nopre">
                        <dl class="um_tdinsm">
                            <dt><a href="javascript:ViewReport('A298040');">효성중공업 <span class="txt1">A298040</span></a><span class="txt2"> -Earnings catch up with industry’s boom</span></dt>
                            <dd> Hyosung Heavy Industries reported that its 3Q operating profit jumped 78% q-q, beating consensus by 17%, led by: 1) booking of sales deferred from 2Q; 2) an improvement in profitability at the electric equipment unit; and 3) turnaround at the construction unit.
</dd><dd> Earnings growth at the electric equipment unit owed largely to a sales-mix improvement?eg, the high-margin North America portion up and the domestic portion down. Considering the hike in orders and their healthy mix, we forecast the firm’s earnings growth to remain intact going forward.
</dd>
                        </dl>
                    </td>
                    <td class="c nopre2"><span class="gpbox">&nbsp;<img src="../img/shbg.png" alt="유지" class="gp_img hold">BUY</span></td>

                            <dt><a href="javascript:ViewReport('A011790');">SKC <span class="txt1">A011790</span></a><span class="txt2"> -본업 부진 vs 글라스기판 기대감 혼조</span></dt>
